message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take it or leave it.
I'm feeling generous, Alice. Don't let this one slip away!
This is my final offer, Bob. The clock is ticking for both of us.
Alice, let's be realistic.  This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Bob, this is as low as I'm willing to go. Take it before inflation eats away at the pot!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than you'd get if we continue this dance. Take the deal!
